Articles.Content:
At some point between the introduction of service bays, and going to 1.0.5 the doors opened wider, or became more robust. This has posed an issue for me because I have one attached to the back of a rover that was originally setup iirc so that the doors wouldn't impact the ground, but alas... now they impact the ground... which blew up my Duna base (quite spectacularly I might add).

Anyway, it would be helpful if we could have door opening limits on these similar to the cargo bays.

A simple idea, but a good one!

Fully support this.

(Additionally, I'd like to be able to set each pair of doors individually, so that I could keep one set from opening while allowing the other to, would be very helpful for builds that are oriented a certain way and/or close to the ground.)
The code already exists,they just need to add it to parts.cfg,and this was already suggested when 1.0.5 was launched.I wonder if SQUAD had done that in 1.1(it's only two parts ).
